title: ‘Little Big Shots’ Sneak Peek: Steve Harvey Meets His 4-Year-Old Match
text: Tweet Share Size definitely does not matter when it comes to the kids on Little Big Shots , NBC’s family-friendly variety show. Take 4-year-old Caleb from Greensboro, N.C., who appears on the March 5 Season 2 premiere. He’s a worship leader at his church and boasts a larger-than-life personality, oodles of charisma, and an innate sense of style. In this sneak peek clip, host Steve Harvey is bowled over talking to the pint-sized Caleb, who leads his church in singing. “I say, ‘Everybody, let’s stand up and join along!'” he tells Harvey of his leadership style. Speaking of style, Caleb definitely likes to look good, just like his grandfather, and wears a spiffy vest and tie. “What kind of tie does he wear?” Harvey asks. “A good one!” Caleb replies. Naturally. Little Big Shots Season 2 premieres Sunday, March 5 at 8 p.m. on NBC. Read more:
